title: Home Health Care May Drop Out of Congress Bill, But Here's How To Plan
description: Reshma Kapadia, associate editor at Barron's, and Carolyn McClanahan, founder of Life Planning Partners, discuss what health care provisions could survive Congressional wrangling and how to plan for aging in place and home health care.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Reshma Kapadia, associate editor at Barron's, and Carolyn McClanahan, founder of Life Planning Partners, discuss what health care provisions could survive Congressional wrangling and how to plan for aging in place and home health care.
